en.title: Do you agree to a divorce?
en.infoPara1: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} has based the breakdown of the marriage on the fact that you have been separated for 2 years, and that you give your consent (agreement) to a divorce.
en.infoPara2: The court must have your consent for the divorce to continue on these grounds.

expandingPanel.heading: What happens if you don’t agree
expandingPanel.contentPara1: If you don’t agree, then the divorce won’t be able to continue based on 2 years separation with consent.
expandingPanel.contentPara2: The application will be returned to your {{ session.divorceWho }}. If they choose to continue, they will need to change the reason for divorce to one that doesn’t need your consent.
expandingPanel.contentPara3: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} will have to pay £{{ feesAmendDivorce }} to change the reason. You may have to pay some or all of this extra fee if they’ve applied to claim their divorce costs.

consentDecree.header: Do you consent to a divorce?
consentDecree.labelNo: No, I don’t give my consent

willDefend.header: Do you want to defend the divorce?
willDefend.labelNo: No, I don’t want to defend
willDefend.answerNo: I will let the divorce proceed and won’t try to prevent it (I don’t intend to 'defend' it).
willDefend.answerYes: I will try to prevent the divorce based on this application (I intend to 'defend' it)

errors.consentRequired: Select if you consent to a divorce or not
errors.defenceRequired: Select if you want to defend or not

cy.title: Ydych chi’n cytuno i ysgaru?
cy.infoPara1: Dywed  eich {{ session.divorceWho }} i’ch priodas chwalu am eich bod wedi gwahanu ers 2 flynedd, a’ch bod chi’n cytuno i gael ysgariad.
cy.infoPara2: Rhaid i’r llys gael eich cydsyniad i’r ysgariad fynd yn ei flaen ar y seiliau hyn.

expandingPanel.heading: Beth fydd yn digwydd os nad ydych yn cytuno?
expandingPanel.contentPara1: Os nad ydych yn cytuno, ni fydd yr ysgariad yn gallu mynd yn ei flaen ar y sail eich bod wedi gwahanu ers 2 flynedd gyda chydsyniad.
expandingPanel.contentPara2: Dychwelir y cais i’ch {{ session.divorceWho }}. Os bydd yn dewis parhau, bydd angen iddo/iddi newid y rheswm dros ysgaru am reswm arall lle nad oes angen eich caniatâd.
expandingPanel.contentPara3: Bydd yn rhaid i’ch {{ session.divorceWho }} dalu Â£{{ feesAmendDivorce }} i newid y rheswm. Efallai y bydd yn rhaid iddo/iddi dalu cyfran o’r ffi ychwanegol hon, neu’r ffi yn ei chyfanrwydd, os gwnaeth gais i hawlio costau ysgaru.

consentDecree.header: Ydych chi’n cydsynio i gael ysgariad?
consentDecree.labelNo: Na, nid wyf yn rhoi fy nghydsyniad

willDefend.header: A ydych am amddiffyn yr ysgariad?
willDefend.labelYes: Ydw, rwyf am amddiffyn yr ysgariad
willDefend.labelNo: Na, nid wyf am amddiffyn yr ysgariad
willDefend.answerNo: Rwyf am adael i’r ysgariad fynd yn ei flaen ac nid wyf am geisio ei atal (nid wyf am ei amddiffyn) .
willDefend.answerYes: Rwyf am geisio atal ysgariad ar y sail a roir y cais hwn (rwy’n bwriadu ei amddiffyn)

errors.consentRequired: Dewiswch hwn pa un a ydych yn cydsynio i’r ysgariad ai peidio
errors.defenceRequired: Dewiswch hwn pa un a ydych eisiau amddiffyn ai peidio
